attributes.action: Make the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry & Meghan Markle a Public Holiday
attributes.additional_details: The 29th of April 2011 was declared a public holiday for Prince William and Catherine Middleton, we want the same opportunity to show our appreciation for Prince Harry and the rest of the Monarchy.
attributes.background: We believe making Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding a public holiday will be a chance for the nation to celebrate Prince Harry and the Monarchy.
